item.description:
If you haven't come to one of these events yet, this meeting is the perfect time to begin!

Start off the New Year by doing something to help the environment! While you're there, join us for a cold beverage, some yummy appetizers, meet new people, and find out how you can contribute to the good fight for our environment.

This meeting - open to all - will have Sierra Club activists who will explain the projects we're working on, from Alternative Energy, Politics, Legislation, Outings, Parks, plus many other Sierra Club subjects.

For more information, contact meetup@sierraclubmass.org.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: January Sierra Club & Beer Meetup
